trait.name: Extinguish Flames
text: Kalkes can extinguish candles, lamps, lanterns and low-burning campfires within 120 feet as a bonus action.

trait.name: Detect Spellcasting
text: Kalkes can sense spellcasting in a 5-mile radius, as long as the effect is not innate.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Kalkes have advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
